name: Popap
description: Popap - is a simple puzzle game. Your task is to get the green cube, avoiding the traps, to the finish line.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo T6600 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 25 MB available space
